CREATE TABLE USERS ( ID integer AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, NAME varchar(16), FULLNAME varchar(50) );
CREATE TABLE POINTS ( ID integer AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, AUTO_ID varchar(6), LATITUDE decimal(10, 6), LONGITUDE decimal(10, 6), TIME decimal(13), SPEED decimal(6, 2), AZIMUTH decimal(10, 6) )
